msbt.message: We've got company visiting from another island?! TODAY?! EXCITING!
I heard we have company from another island hanging out here today! So cool!
Are the folks on the island today here to see you, ?I have to go say hiiiiiiii before they go home!
I better hurry! I don't want to miss saying hi to our company!They might have connections in the music industry!
Do you think my outfit isI don't know, weird? Today, I mean?I just want to make sure I'm extra fashionable for our company!
Now that they're here and I have the chance to add to my fan baseI've GOT to go say hi!
Well, they came all the way here, so I hope they have a fab time!
I wonder what song I should sing so our guests will remember me and tell record companies about me?
